messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Fw: Spank Your Children? Local Man Gives Out Paddles, Directions - News Story - WTAE Pittsburgh
messages.msgSnippet: -=- But according to his Web site, the paddles are to be used lovingly and never in anger. -=- I ve read this type of thing before - most often in the words of
messages.messageBody:
-=- But according to his Web site, the paddles are to be used lovingly
and never in anger. -=-

I've read this type of thing before - most often in the words of the
Pearls or other such advocates of corporal punishment. And it just
baffles me. How is it possible to use your hand, a piece of wood, or a
plastic whip to HIT your child - or anyone - with the intention if
causing discomfort or physical pain in a LOVING manner??

~ Susan
